mapper.select: SELECT mi.curriculum_name,mi.curriculum_url,mi.type,ifNULL(0,li.learn_time) AS learnTime,mi.id FROM user_class u INNER join must_curriculum mc on u.class_id = mc.class_id and mc.del_flag = '0' INNER join curriculum_info mi on mc.curriculum_id = mi.id and mi.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN learn_info li on mc.curriculum_id = li.curriculum_id and u.user_id = li.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
